summary: Experienced Senior Editor with a demonstrated history of working in the broadcast media industry. Skilled in Translation, Breaking News, Journalism, Radio, and Television. Strong professional with a Post-Graduate Diploma, Khartoum University, Sudan focused in International Relations from Department of Political Sciences.
